name: Shiny Hunting Simulator 1.2
description:
Go shiny hunting for ditto (more to come) and try your luck!

Game info:

FIGHT - inflict damage to defeat it or make it easier to catch.

CATCH - Attempt to capture the pokemon - chances of a successful catch depend on the abbount of HP your opponent has.

SHINY ODDS:             KS - Kill Streak, CS - Catch streak

KS 0 / CS 0:

1/4098

KS 10 / CS 5:

1/2048

KS 30 / CS 10:

1/1024

KS 40 / CS 30:

1/512

KS 50 / CS 40:

1/256

KS 100 / CS 50:

1/128
